name: Saving Caesar
description:
I RECOMMEND PLAYING THE WINDOWS VERSION FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE, BUT IF YOU HAVE ISSUES USE THE WEB VERSION

Everyone is trying to kill Caesar! Keep him alive by fighting off Senators, Gladiators, Soldiers and Gods using a variety of weapons!

-15 waves total

-checkpoints upon completion of waves 4, 5, 9, 10, 14

**Controls:**

WASD to move

F to toggle Caesar following you

Left Click to attack

Right Click to Shield

Q and E to swap between weapons

E to interact with shop

Esc to pause

![Title_screen.png](///raw/2bf/c/z/30a57.png)

**Credits :**

Coding: Johnathan Browning

3D modeling and animation: Bryce Mysona

Music, sounds, and textures: Matthew Spoleti
